/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and power lines, adding a touch of urban greenery to the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly muted, creating a calm and serene atmosphere.
